components.name: Airspeed Sensor
components.description: Measures aircraft speed through the air

components.name: Engine Monitor
components.description: Monitors engine parameters and generates warnings

components.name: Fuel System
components.description: Monitors fuel levels and generates fuel warnings

components.name: Flight Management Computer
components.description: Central flight computer that determines flight modes

components.name: Terrain Warning System
components.description: Monitors altitude and descent rate for terrain proximity

components.name: Engine Control Unit
components.description: Controls engine thrust based on flight mode

components.name: Hydraulic Control
components.description: Controls landing gear and flaps via hydraulics

components.name: Primary Flight Display
components.description: Processes warnings and sends display updates

components.name: Master Warning Light
components.description: Physical warning light in cockpit (consumer only)

components.name: Audio Warning System
components.description: Plays audio alerts for critical warnings (consumer only)

components.name: Navigation Computer
components.description: Processes navigation data and coordinates with multiple systems
